title: VH1 Storytellers
overview: The greatest singers and songwriters play their music and tell the stories behind their greatest songs on this acclaimed VH1 music performance series. Each one-hour episode takes viewers behind the scenes with a single artist or group, such as Ray Davies, Elvis Costello, Melissa Etheridge, Garth Brooks, James Taylor, David Bowie, The Eurythmics, The Pretenders, Stone Pilots, Bon Jovi, Wyclef Jean, and Green Day featuring intimate musical performances and the first-hand stories behind the performer's hits and sentimental favorites.
